name: Beef Stir Fry
steps:
Marinate beef strips with soy sauce and cornstarch for 10 minutes.
Heat sesame oil in a wok over high heat.
Add beef and cook for 2-3 minutes until browned.
Add vegetables and garlic, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add remaining soy sauce and toss everything together.
Serve over rice.
